forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy. Showers developing this afternoon. High 6C. Winds E at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy and windy with showers developing this afternoon. High 43F. Winds E at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 1C. Winds E at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low near 35F. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
